name: Swap Blocks
description: In Swap Blocks you will match 3 or more similar blocks on a game board by swapping blocks. Play solo game modes, or play against a CPU or another player. There are also various challenge puzzles to test you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz processor or greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X 9.0 compatible or later DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 124 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X 9.0 compatible sound card Additional Notes: Xbox One Controller Support
